message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $145. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides. What do you say?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $145. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is really closer to my initial price. How about we meet halfway and settle at $130?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant to pay $130. I'm willing to compromise, but I think I can only go up to $115. Can you consider that?
